text.section: No examination or part of any examination required by this chapter shall be given unless a quorum of the board is present to supervise that examination.

Examinations given by the board shall cover all phases of the applicant's qualifications for the particular license, including the skill and technique of the applicant, as well as scientific and other knowledge.
Examinations shall be given at regularly prescribed intervals as set by the board.
Examinations shall be given at the principal office of the board or at a location approved by the board.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 22, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 6, effective June 24, 2003.
